comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: The bridge is a unique and historically important design by the great British engineer and entrepreneur Isambard Kingdom Brunel. The river is the Wye.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Darkroom Daze: We will add the river name to the description. Thanks also for the information about engineer Isambard Kingdom Brunel's connection to this bridge. By coincidence, our blog (Picture This) just highlighted another of his projects, the steam ship the “Great Eastern" : blogs.loc.gov/picturethis/2013/01/caught-our-eyes-an-engi...
